    • Uses of ClusterNode in io.hekate.cluster

      Methods in io.hekate.cluster that return ClusterNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterNode ClusterTopology.first()
      Returns the first node of the ClusterTopology.nodes() list or null if this topology is empty.
      ClusterNode ClusterTopology.get(ClusterNodeId id)
      Returns the node for the specified identifier or null if there is no such node within this topology.
      ClusterNode ClusterTopology.last()
      Returns the last node of the ClusterTopology.nodes() list or null if this topology is empty.
      ClusterNode ClusterTopology.localNode()
      Returns local node or null if local node is not within this topology.
      ClusterNode ClusterService.localNode()
      Returns the local cluster node.
      ClusterNode ClusterTopology.oldest()
      Returns the oldest node of this topology.
      ClusterNode ClusterTopology.random()
      Returns a random node of this topology.
      ClusterNode ClusterTopology.youngest()
      Returns the youngest node of this topology.
      Methods in io.hekate.cluster that return types with arguments of type ClusterNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ClusterNode> ClusterFilter.apply(List<ClusterNode> nodes)
      Applies this filter to the specified group of cluster nodes and returns a new set of only those nodes that were accepted by this filter.
      NavigableSet<ClusterNode> ClusterTopology.joinOrder()
      Returns an immutable set of all nodes ordered by their join order.
      List<ClusterNode> ClusterTopology.nodes()
      Returns an immutable list of all nodes with consistent ordering based on Comparable.compareTo(Object) method.
      Set<ClusterNode> ClusterTopology.nodeSet()
      Returns an immutable set of all nodes within this topology.
      List<ClusterNode> ClusterTopology.remoteNodes()
      Returns an immutable list of remote nodes within this topology ordered by their identifiers.
      Stream<ClusterNode> ClusterTopology.stream()
      Returns Stream of all nodes from this topology.
      Methods in io.hekate.cluster with parameters of type ClusterNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean ClusterNodeFilter.accept(ClusterNode node)
      Returns true if this filter accepts the specified node.
      String ClusterAcceptor.acceptJoin(ClusterNode joining, Hekate local)
      Called when a new node tries to join the cluster.
      int ClusterNode.compareTo(ClusterNode o)
      Compares this node with the specified one based on id() value.
      boolean ClusterTopology.contains(ClusterNode node)
      Returns true if this topology contains the specified node.
      static ClusterFilter ClusterFilters.forNode(ClusterNode node)
      Filters out all nodes but the specified one.
      default T ClusterFilterSupport.forNode(ClusterNode node)
      Returns a copy of this instance that will use ClusterFilters.forNode(ClusterNode) filter along with all the filter criteria that were inherited from this instance.
      static ClusterNodeJmx ClusterNodeJmx.of(ClusterNode node)
      Constructs a new ClusterNodeJmx instance from the specified node.
      Method parameters in io.hekate.cluster with type arguments of type ClusterNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ClusterNode> ClusterFilter.apply(List<ClusterNode> nodes)
      Applies this filter to the specified group of cluster nodes and returns a new set of only those nodes that were accepted by this filter.
      default void ClusterView.forEach(Consumer<ClusterNode> consumer)
      Performs the given action for each node of this view.

    • Uses of ClusterNode in io.hekate.messaging.broadcast

      Methods in io.hekate.messaging.broadcast that return types with arguments of type ClusterNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<ClusterNode,Throwable> BroadcastResult.errors()
      Returns the map of cluster nodes and errors that happened while trying to communicate with these nodes.
      Map<ClusterNode,Throwable> AggregateResult.errors()
      Returns the map of cluster nodes and errors that happened while trying to communicate with those nodes.
      List<ClusterNode> BroadcastResult.nodes()
      Returns the broadcast operation participants.
      List<ClusterNode> AggregateResult.nodes()
      Returns the aggregation participants.
      Map<ClusterNode,T> AggregateResult.resultsByNode()
      Returns a map of cluster nodes and results that were successfully received from these nodes.
      Methods in io.hekate.messaging.broadcast with parameters of type ClusterNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Throwable BroadcastResult.errorOf(ClusterNode node)
      Returns a communication error for the specified node or null if there was no communication failure with that node.
      default Throwable AggregateResult.errorOf(ClusterNode node)
      Returns an error for the specified node or null if there was no failure on that node.
      default boolean BroadcastResult.isSuccess(ClusterNode node)
      Returns true if there was no communication failure with the specified cluster node..
      default boolean AggregateResult.isSuccess(ClusterNode node)
      Returns true if there was no failure during the aggregation request processing on the specified cluster node.
      default void AggregateCallback.onReplyFailure(T request, ClusterNode node, Throwable cause)
      Called in case of a cluster node communication failure.
      default void AggregateCallback.onReplySuccess(Response<T> rsp, ClusterNode node)
      Called after a reply was received from a cluster node.
      default void BroadcastCallback.onSendFailure(T message, ClusterNode node, Throwable error)
      Called in case of a cluster node communication failure.
      default void BroadcastCallback.onSendSuccess(T message, ClusterNode node)
      Called when message was successfully submitted to the cluster node.
      default T AggregateResult.resultOf(ClusterNode node)
      Returns the result for the specified cluster node or null if there was no result from this node.

      Selects a node based on the partition mapping of the operation's affinity key.

      Selects a random node from the load balancer context.
